column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews Donald K. Allen , independent candidate for US presidency

#Text=While nearly all mainstream coverage of the 2008 Presidential election has focused on the Democratic and Republican candidates , the race for the White House also includes independents and third-party candidates .
#Text=These prospects represent a variety of views that may not be acknowledged by the major party platforms .

#Text=Wikinews has reached out to these candidates throughout the campaign and now presents an interview with Donald K. Allen of Youngstown , Ohio , an independent presidential candidate who registered with the Federal Election Committee in January 2007 .
#Text=He says that his three major policies are " 1 . Take care of America and Americans first .
